Education Minister Michael Gove has launched a review of the National Curriculum in England.`` It is my ambition to reduce unnecessary prescription, bureaucracy and central control throughout the education system'' he said. That means making a new approach to the curriculum. The Michael Government has commissioned a panel of headteachers and academics to review the current curriculum, with the new National Curriculum programmes of study for English, mathematics, science and physical education set to be introduced for

Last night a source close to the X Factor host said: Cheryl considered going back to her maiden name but now she has dismissed the idea. People knew who she was as a Tweedy but she has only become truly famous as Cheryl Cole. yet but seeds have been sown by people like Black Eyed Peas singer Will.i.am and it is important she creates a lasting brand. It would be madness to change back. The Sunday Mirror can also confirm that Simon Cowell has promised her a job as a judge on the US X Factor. He has spent the past few days convincing American producers that she will be a huge success.
